div.p: The Numbler API does not support some of the features that are supported via the browser interface. Some of these features are likely to be added to future versions of the API. If you find a feature that you need to have supported please let us know.
You cannot set the format of a cell via the API including the background color, the font color, underline, etc.
The column width and row height cannot be set via the API
sorting is only supported via the browser
You cannot programatically request a lock yet. We will be adding this feature shortly
